actions.ACTIVATE_SEND_SUCCESS: {{email}} has been sent an activation link. Please check your inbox.
actions.ACTIVATE_TOKEN_FAILURE: Activation token is invalid or has expired.

mailgun.body: Thanks for signing up for {{site}}! Please confirm your email address by clicking on the link below.
mailgun.footer: You're receiving this email because you recently created a new {{site}} account or added a new email address. If this wasn't you, please ignore this email.
mailgun.link: Or copy and paste the following into your browser: {{confirmLink}}
mailgun.title: E-mail Verification

GDPR.desc: By continuing to visit this site, you accept to the use of cookies by {{services}} for statistical purposes.

actions.RESET_SEND_SUCCESS: {{email}} has been sent a password reset. Please check your inbox.
actions.RESET_TOKEN_FAILURE: Password reset token is invalid or has expired.

mailgun.body: Someone has requested that your {{site}} account password be reset. If this wasn't you, you can safely ignore this email and your password will remain the same.
mailgun.footer: Or just visit {{resetLink}} in your browser
mailgun.title: Password Reset

error.Exists: E-mail or Username already in use
error.TermsAgree: Must agree to terms to continue

game.consent:
Welcome to Pantheon.world. By participating in our online games, you agree that your participation is voluntary and that the information you provide can be used for research purposes. The goal of this project is to understand human collective memory.

If you agree to participate, we will collect data on your answers, and you will have the option to answer a demographic questionnaire (age, gender, location, education, and languages). The data collected will be anonymized at the moment of collection using a one-way (irreversible) hashing method. Participation data will be stored in pantheon.world servers. Anonymized data may be released publicly in the future for research purposes. As a user you can decide to end your participation in the study at any moment (no minimum participation time is required). You will not be paid for playing these online games. New games will be made available on a daily basis.

This proposal has been reviewed and approved by the TSE-IAST Review Board for Ethical Standards in Research.

In case of questions, contact hello@centerforcollectivelearning.org

Agree and Continue
game.getting-started:
HOW TO PLAY

Guess which candidates support this proposal. You have 4 tries!

Hit the enter key to check your guess.

After each guess, the colour of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the correct answer.

Example: The green tile shows the answer is correct.

Two new games will be available every day!
game.title: Who agrees with this proposal?

popup.title: Would you answer some extra questions?
popup.description: Answer these questions to help us understand the spatial distribution of the platform's participation.
popup.consent-form:
Welcome to Pantheon.world. By participating in our online games, you agree that your participation is voluntary and that the information you provide can be used for research purposes. The goal of this project is to understand human collective memory.

If you agree to participate, we will collect data on your answers, and you will have the option to answer a demographic questionnaire (age, gender, location, education, and languages). The data collected will be anonymized at the moment of collection using a one-way (irreversible) hashing method. Participation data will be stored in pantheon.world servers. Anonymized data may be released publicly in the future for research purposes. As a user you can decide to end your participation in the study at any moment (no minimum participation time is required). You will not be paid for playing these online games. New games will be made available on a daily basis.

This proposal has been reviewed and approved by the TSE-IAST Review Board for Ethical Standards in Research.

In case of questions, contact hello@centerforcollectivelearning.org

Agree and Continue
